cf.lukasheinzl.mc.api.inventory

Class InventoryAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • cf.lukasheinzl.mc.api.inventory.InventoryAction

  • public class InventoryAction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a few useful inventory action that can be used by the InventoryListener.
    Author:
    Lukas Heinzl
